十五年球迷 冇雲加5會鐘意阿仙奴 鐘意係因為細個睇球迷世界 點解踢波可以咁快 好似粒波子咁彈黎彈去 咁就開始鐘意左 愈大就睇得愈多 電腦電視到而加電話幾點都會睇 真係鐘意就會咁好自然 冇雲加真係冇阿仙奴 如果你係d幾年先開始睇開始鐘意同埋本身個人忽既真係5好亂走出黎屌 我理得你香港人英國人美國人 全世界都知英超最難踢 年年保前四 係一個咩環境下都保持到你仲話佢廢？ 有幾多人做到？  幫埋你賺錢 每一分一毫都係靠自己既 你走去笑9人地 我覺得係一種精神同藝術 d兩個月部份球迷真係太離譜 球會5俾有低潮？ 低潮你5撐 仲日屌夜屌 愈講愈難聽 你憑咩話你自己鐘意 冇錯而加係有問題出現 邊隊ball未試過有問題？贏你就yeahyeahyeah 輸打贏要真係好垃圾 你咁L屌得咪飛去酋長門口屌飽佢 on9仔 屌又屌得5全面5立體 屌d5屌d 冇睇場波既又屌 起身嚕見到有人屌梗又一齊屌 贏啦有人踢得好啦就出黎抽水blablabla 阿仙奴基本上有今時今日既野都係雲加造出黎 就算今日佢真係一手整番冧佢又關你L事咩 5好有咩就走出黎講到自己有份咁 你同我都係球迷 用對眼去睇有好多野我地都係5知 我d一刻淨係知雲加真係5會教得耐啦 我好珍惜有佢既日子 七十歲人應該退休了享福了 仲成日咁辛苦 我地係真係好應該愛佢多d 其實首先係要欣賞佢既堅持同精神 藝術從來都不容易 好想俾爺爺知道好多人仲撐梗你 。@arsenal #coyg

由06年自己踢波而睇阿仙奴，就已經比佢既踢法吸引左。果時仲有好年青有為既法比仔，完全係我既偶像

果陣鐘意阿仙奴，係因為佢踢法華麗，行雲流水。係果陣時，英超基本上得佢係踢呢種進攻。雖然曼聯都叫有d睇頭，但云云眾波之中，呢隊波真係好耀眼。

佢又主打年輕，以培養有心既球員為主，希望呢班後生仔可以心流阿血腳踢阿波。

雖然一直無冠，但唔緊要，因為支持既係一隊踢悅目足球既隊，而唔係一支英式踢法個波9成時間都係天空既球隊。記得摩連奴入主車仔，果時好服佢，但又好憎佢，因為佢將足球變為一門純粹為左勝利既運動。

到希比、路jj 仲有達斯華年代，真係阿迷近十年既高潮，完全係華麗足球既代表之一，只係比巴塞差d。

好近冠軍既一年，可惜達斯華斷腳。果日真係心情低到極點。唔係因為差d攞到英超，而係瑋個好好既球員點解要受咁大創傷。

記得由果時開始，阿記總係時好時壞，有好波，但更多既係傷同失望。不斷培養既新人，一係重傷如藍斯，一係就轉會。雖然一直都有前四，但我知道，呢隊阿仙奴己經盡左。

又遇著金錢帝國既興起，車仔 鏝城等愈黎愈勁，而英超亦開始有更快、更高技術既打法出現，雲格無以為繼。


所以係呢點上，我係好尊敬費sir，因為佢能夠改變、調節，去玩英超呢隻game。

雲加一直堅持原則，唔買大牌球星，堅持地面進攻，要踢好波。呢點我係十分認同，亦係我愛阿仙奴既原因。

可惜，事與願違，班波踢唔到高水準既足球，當然都因為英超列強都勁左好多，亦都因為好既球員不再能夠以應有價錢買到。

所以，雲加失敗了。敗在未能夠適應時代，但又故執地堅持原則，就好似我地香港人咁。

阿仙奴依家既衰落，其實一早估得到，不過係遲早。所以，雲加，謝謝你，但你都係時候要割愛了，因為，我地愛既唔單止係因為你創造既阿仙奴，更愛既係阿仙奴標誌性既有血性既漂亮足球。

記得由果時開始，阿記總係時好時壞，有好波，但更多既係傷同失望。不斷培養既新人，一係重傷如藍斯，一係就轉會。雖然一直都有前四，但我知道，呢隊阿仙奴己經盡左。

又遇著金錢帝國既興起，車仔 鏝城等愈黎愈勁，而英超亦開始有更快、更高技術既打法出現，雲格無以為繼。


所以係呢點上，我係好尊敬費sir，因為佢能夠改變、調節，去玩英超呢隻game。

雲加一直堅持原則，唔買大牌球星，堅持地面進攻，要踢好波。呢點我係十分認同，亦係我愛阿仙奴既原因。

可惜，事與願違，班波踢唔到高水準既足球，當然都因為英超列強都勁左好多，亦都因為好既球員不再能夠以應有價錢買到。

所以，雲加失敗了。敗在未能夠適應時代，但又故執地堅持原則，就好似我地香港人咁。

阿仙奴依家既衰落，其實一早估得到，不過係遲早。所以，雲加，謝謝你，但你都係時候要割愛了，因為，我地愛既唔單止係因為你創造既阿仙奴，更愛既係阿仙奴標誌性既有血性既漂亮足球。

蘇甘保狂插奧斯爾
3小時前

【now.com體育】名宿是世界上最多嘴的動物，前阿仙奴中堅蘇甘保對於近況低迷的奧斯爾連珠炮發，毫不留情。

為阿仙奴贏得兩次英超的蘇甘保（Sol Campbell），談到前東家近期戰績不濟時，把矛頭指向德國中場奧斯爾。

上輪英超對利物浦，奧斯爾因感冒缺陣，而周二歐聯對拜仁僅後段後備上陣。蘇甘保不點名作出批評：「球員時代，我都試過抱恙上陣，除非病到暈頭轉向，站不穩、跑不動。」

「但當你患病時，你也該隨隊出發打氣，或者翌日才休息，睡個好覺。」該名前英格蘭國腳於2006年首次離開兵工廠，2010年回歸，隨後在紐卡素掛靴，「我不喜歡留在家中，球員是大把時間休息。」

「見微知著，這些小事反映你的性格，而且會影響年輕球員的心態，現在球隊處於困境，所有人都挺身而出。」蘇甘保補充道。

「見微知著，這些小事反映你的性格，而且會影響年輕球員的心態，現在球隊處於困境，所有人都挺身而出。」蘇甘保補充道。

So what is the situation with Sanchez's stats? Has Wenger seen something that has been missed?

Interestingly, given the widely-held belief that the player's work rate is one of his greatest assets and that it is his team-mates who are letting him down, Sanchez's physical data is not that impressive.

Firstly, the running data. This is a headline figure that is easily digestible for coaches but can be misleading because it does not allow for the intensity and intelligence of players' work.

And yet, it is still a little alarming that Sanchez is yet to run 10 kilometres in a single Premier League game this season despite having completed the 90 minutes on 20 occasions.

By way of comparison, Mesut Ozil, a player sometimes styled as diffident, has hit that mark in 14 of the 16 full Premier League games that he has played this season.

Of course, the comparison is not like for like given that Sanchez has been utilised as a forward for much of the campaign.


Surprisingly, Sanchez has not run 10 kilometres in a game once this season

However, consider the fact that Olivier Giroud has run more than 10 kilometres on each of the occasions that he has played the 90 minutes and a different picture emerges.

Is Sanchez really working as hard as he can? In his last Premier League start against Hull he had the lowest average speed of all 26 outfield players to feature in the match.

But it is not just the distances that Sanchez is covering, although a failure to track runners has been a bigger problem since being moved back to the flank to accommodate Giroud.

訓先
聽朝先睇

Sanchez's much-vaunted intensity has not been evident of late either. In particular, his total of 46 high-intensity sprints in the defeat to Chelsea was his lowest in a full game all season.

Indeed, it is this dip in Sanchez's numbers that is likely to be troubling Wenger.

The seven times that Sanchez has run even 9.3 kilometres in a match all came in his first 13 appearances of the season. In the last 13 appearances? He has not run that far once.

It's a similar story with his sprint stats. The high of 72 came at Watford in August and the next three most energetic performances all came before the end of November.



Sanchez's running and sprinting stats have dipped since December


So what changed? There was talk of a concrete offer from China in December, interest from Chelsea and a contract figure floated by Arsenal that was some way short of expectations.

Back-to-back defeats to Everton and Manchester City followed and Sanchez's demeanour has deteriorated since - including a bizarre strop when substituted in the 4-0 win at Swansea in January.

More recently, Robert Pires confirmed that Sanchez walked off the training pitch last week as he was unhappy at having been on the receiving end of a kick from a colleague. Laurent Koscielny's attempts to persuade him to return were in vain.

Sanchez has had the air of a man exasperated by his team-mates and increasingly keen to play as an individual - at odds with Wenger's long-held views on the right way to play.

Sanchez stat

In the December defeat to Manchester City, Sanchez ran 8.30 kilometres despite playing the whole game. That was closer to the 5.05 kilometres covered by goalkeeper Petr Cech than the 12.15 kilometres ran by midfielder Granit Xhaka.


A look at the possession stats tell some of the story. Sanchez has lost the ball exactly 100 times more than any other Arsenal player this season.

In fact, he is responsible for nine of the 10 occasions when an Arsenal player has the lost the ball 24 times or more in a single Premier League match this season.

It's a product of playing in such an advanced role, but things reached a nadir in the shock 2-1 home defeat to Watford when Sanchez surrendered the ball a season-high 30 times.

If Sanchez's frustration, whether it is as a result of his contract, the team's form or his future at the club, is affecting his decision-making as well as his work ethic then it is a major issue.

Perhaps that is what Wenger identified and elected to act upon at Liverpool. Solving the Sanchez problem is just one of the many challenges facing the Frenchman now.

Mesut Ozil has been made a huge £280,000-a-week offer to stay at Arsenal .

But Ozil is holding out, knowing he can get even bigger money elsewhere.
===============
Arsenal have yet to offer a new deal despite the 23-year-old’s contract being another that expires in 2018, and even if they do now start negotiations there is little change he will sign.

Oxlade-Chamberlain believes he may need a fresh start to reinvigorate his international career, and Manchester United and Manchester City are watching developments closely.

on Theo Walcott’s comments about seeing arguments in training…
No. A lot has been said about that which is exaggerated. We have a good, united, determined group. When you go through disappointing results, you always have some disagreements but overall the best way to respond is always in the game. We have to show how united and determined we are. Overall, on that front I don’t worry. In our job, you have to be competitive and competitiveness doesn’t always mean love. It is about performing. In the past, it’s not the team who loves each other the most who is the best on the football field.

on talk about the Ox leaving in the summer…
I haven’t seen that. I’m surprised by that because I believe that he has been developed well, he is developing well at the moment and he has been given his chance. When you are somewhere, you have to want to be there first. After that, the only thing I can say is that personally I rate him highly. I showed that in the way I keep faith in him when he spent long times out injured. He’s developing very well at the moment.

on if the Ox will be here next season…
I personally wish that he stays at the club, because I think he’s a very promising player who has developed very well and who looks to me to have the values that we rate at this club.

Close friend of Wenger reveals contract situation, ‘immense sadness’ coming over Arsenal exit

“The results are not as expected, the supporters are angry but Arsene is impervious to outside pressure and has the support of the board. His sadness will be immense, the day he leaves Arsenal. It is he who will decide his future. His contract renewal is ready. He only has to sign it. He is aware of some errors, especially in recruitment.”

The French newspaper explain that Stan Kroenke is reluctant to change manager because he’s worried it won’t be so easy to find someone who can guarantee Champions League football every year on a budget which isn’t as generous as some others.

Wenger’s ‘immense sadness’ over an Arsenal exit will happen sooner or later, but it seems those in charge at the club would rather it was the latter option.

Overall, on that front I don’t worry. In our job, you have to be competitive and competitiveness doesn’t always mean love. It is about performing. In the past, it’s not the team who loves each other the most who is the best on the football field.

on talk about the Ox leaving in the summer…
I haven’t seen that. I’m surprised by that because I believe that he has been developed well, he is developing well at the moment and he has been given his chance. When you are somewhere, you have to want to be there first. After that, the only thing I can say is that personally I rate him highly. I showed that in the way I keep faith in him when he spent long times out injured. He’s developing very well at the moment.

on if the Ox will be here next season…
I personally wish that he stays at the club, because I think he’s a very promising player who has developed very well and who looks to me to have the values that we rate at this club.

[ 若要人不知除非己莫為 ]

在香港討論區多年 , 曾經遇過一位奇人 , 相信有"蒲"開香討的阿迷一定認識他 , 他便是宿花間了。

他是一位反阿迷 , 而且是一位高質的反阿迷 , 他不會直接反阿仙奴 , 不會直接用粗口鬧阿仙奴 , 因為這和"自殺"沒有分別。

他很懂得討論區的規則 , 懂得如何在反阿之餘 , 在討論區生存下去 , 我相信他的IQ比得上金田一。

他用的方法是暗喻 , 寫一篇文章看似在稱讚阿仙奴 , 實際是在冷嘲暗諷 , 這種文可以做成一種叫"引抽"的效果 , 例如文章"為何阿仙奴是英超最偉大的球隊 ?" 然後一大篇偉論 , 文章一出 , 不少讀者自會"中伏"參與"討論", 所以他根本不用反 , 別人自會幫他反阿。

說真的 , 他的文筆是一流 , 也有豐富的古詩詞知識 , 勝過網上不少作者 , 包括我 , 我在他面前 , 文筆只能算是小學生水平。

他有張良計 , 我們(版主們)當然都有過牆梯 , 但一次一次 , 一場又一場暗戰 , 看似他消失後 , 他又會回到討論區做著相同的事 , 不管晴天陰天雨天 , 他對反阿的熱誠好比愚公 , 是一種堅持 。

當時我做著版主的工作 , 私底下和他聊過天 , 何解你會如此憎恨阿仙奴呢? 事隔多年記憶模糊 , 只記得"不喜歡"三個字 , 反阿背後他純為發泄 , 反阿背後 , 他其實是一個不錯的人 , 談起古文 , 談起歷史 , 他可以和你說個三天。

我很久也沒有上香討了 , 不知他是否仍"存在"著。

香討的宿花間 , 做的事純為發泄 , 但你有沒有想到同樣的"宿花間"做著相同的事 , 在FB是有利可圖 , 這便是FB成功的地方 , 當你認為此地有利可圖時 , 實際上FB早已想著如何在你身上找甜頭了。

昨天和一位朋友食午飯 , 不約而同談起阿仙奴的低潮 , 也聽見朋友說起的一個故事 , 想不到阿仙奴最低潮 , 是別人眼中的最佳商機。

故事是這樣的 , A君在外國網站找到一篇"文章" , 內容很簡單 , 便是一位洋人滿口穢語在論述在批評阿仙奴被他隊逼和 , 對於香港的讀者 , 這種文章他們不會感興趣 , 因為大部分也看不明 , 正如台灣人看不明'低俗笑話'般 , 但因粗口度絕對是五星級 , 那位A君有見及此 , 把外國的五星級粗口轉譯為廣東式的五星級粗口版 , 當中已不能用粗鄙不雅形容 , 我很好奇香港教肓如何訓練這位文學天才出來。

此"文章"一出大受歡迎 , 因為文章把阿仙奴球迷不敢說出來全寫出來 , A君也順利達成他的"目的" , 而且超出他的預計 , 試問如此佳落井下石的機會 , 其他球迷怎會放過呢?

第一集成功 , 讓A君熱心在等著第二集 , 結果阿仙奴輸了 , 輸了給拜仁 , 而且是大敗 , 他的成功也在延續 , 這時有個B君出現 , 他看著商機 , 搶先一步譯寫了第三集 , A君看見了只有苦笑。

最搞笑是 - 第四集 , 就在阿仙奴主場大敗給拜仁後 , A君和B君等了九十幾分鐘 , 夢寐以求的結果出現 , F5F5F5地按著 , 在等待洋人的最新"文章" , 兩人一收到文章便立刻加工 , 最終這篇英譯中的文章鬧出"雙胞胎" , 差的是A君這次跑贏了B君 , 更早的推出市面 , B君花了數小時 , 不甘放棄 , 最終仍是決心把他作品推出 , 一子錯滿盤皆落索。

初初聽到這個故事 , 我不太信 , 但花了數分鐘看一看各大阿仙奴網站 , 由其貼街招的也是同一人 ...... 倒是幾令人相信。 我也相信此文章系列也會再次延續下去 , 一集在一集在的手機出現。 將來推出曼聯版 , 利物浦版也絕不出奇 。

經歷討論區多年 , 什麼人什麼事也遇過 , 反阿迷雲反雲也看得淡了 , 有一句話說得對 - 認真你就輸了。

但事隔多年 , 網上仍有一種人是令我十分討厭的 , 那種人叫假阿 。

阿仙奴目前陷入內憂外患，近期成績一落千丈，外界又盛傳陣中球星阿歷斯山齊斯鬧「兵」變，已經破壞了雲加在廠迷心目中形象，不過雲加強調：「我不是為著個人形象，而是為球會工作。長時間效力兵工廠，就證明我多喜愛這間球會，並忠於這間球會。」

美國佬如果搵唔到人應該會大爺爺留底

都唔知有邊個做得掂

阿仙奴突然發出聲明，似乎是想遏止近日球迷及傳媒對球會的批評和非議，表明球會「自有決定」的立場。聲明刻意避免提及對雲加去留的取向，但基斯域克爵士全文內容，並無任何表示支持雲加的字句，反而引起了外界更多猜測，不少人認為即使阿仙奴未有最後決定，也已在認真考慮易帥的事情了。
現年23歲的張伯倫，當年挾著「新禾確特」之名加盟阿仙奴，但這名英格蘭中場近季的發揮似乎不甚如意，因此導致此子考慮轉會求變。據了解，目前有不少的英超球會均有意簽下這名前修咸頓球員，其中包括利物浦、曼聯、曼城和愛華頓。

馬斯真認從後侵犯迪馬利亞

昨天尼馬及蘇亞雷斯多次在禁區內與PSG球員接觸，38歲德國球證艾迪堅（Deniz Aytekin）下半場兩度把12碼判給巴塞，相反馬斯真蘭奴禁區內手球及疑似從後侵犯迪馬利亞則未有吹罰，馬斯真賽後承認犯規，更令艾迪堅成為賽事焦點。親皇馬的西班牙《馬卡報》就指出，艾迪堅正是2010/11球季中，在國家打吡把比比逐出場之人。
